name: Containerization
detail: Proficient in packaging applications and their dependencies into containers using tools like Docker, ensuring consistent behavior across various environments.

name: Backend Security
detail: Skilled in implementing security protocols and standards such as OAuth and JWT to safeguard application data and user information.

name: Database Management
detail: Proficiency in relational and NoSQL databases like MySQL and MongoDB. Experienced in designing, querying, and optimizing databases for performance and scalability.

name: Version Control
detail: Extensive experience with version control systems, especially Git, to track and manage code changes collaboratively.

name: API Design & Development
detail: Expertise in designing and developing robust application programming interfaces to ensure efficient communication between software components.

name: Testing and Debugging
detail: Proficient in writing unit tests using frameworks like JUnit and skilled in debugging applications to ensure optimal performance.
